alert.note: Alert for Fond du Lac; Green Lake (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:38PM CDT until July 23 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GREEN LAKE AND NORTHWESTERN FOND DU LAC COUNTIES... At 537 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Poygan to 6 miles west of Oshkosh to Rosendale, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported multiple trees down across northern Green Lake County. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fond Du Lac, Ripon, Berlin, North Fond Du Lac, Rosendale, Green Lake, Brandon, Southern Lake Winnebago, Lamartine, Eldorado, Fairwater, Van Dyne, Lagoda and West Rosendale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
